channel.title: B15 Informatik 3 (Info3) on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen
channel.description: Recent content in B15 Informatik 3 (Info3) on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen

item.title: Schedule
item.description: This schedule is, more than always, tentative. Week KW Date Lecture Topic Lab (Tue & Wed) 1 14 Tue 04/04/2023 Wed 05/04/2023 Introduction to Info3, Source Code Management No Lab. 2 15 Tue 11/04/2023 Source Code Management (GIT) 1 - Lab Startup Wed 12/04/2023 Introduction to Software Engineering and Software Development Processes 3 16 Tue 18/04/2023 System Modeling, Architectural Design, Requirement Engineering 2 - Learning Python Wed 19/04/2023 UML & System Modeling, Use Cases and User Stories 4 17 Tue 25/04/2023 UML & System Modeling: Requirements, Product Owner Game 3 - Python Project Wed 26/04/2023 – no lecture – 5 18 Tue 02/05/2023 Software Processes II / Requirements Analysis 4 - Use Cases and Class Diagrams Part I Wed 03/05/2023 Software Design Patterns (GOF) 6 19 Tue 09/05/2023 Clean Code Intro & Poster preparation 5 - Use Cases and Class Diagrams Part II Wed 10/05/2023 Clean Code Poster Session 7 20 Tue 16/05/2023 e-learning / Software Design Patterns (GOF) or Clean Code Himmelfahrt Wed 17/05/2023 e-learning / Video Summary 8 21 Tue 23/05/2023 Agile Development, Scrum 6 - Sequence Diagrams Wed 24/05/2023 Legacy Code & Refactoring 9 22 Tue 30/05/2023 Software Testing 7 - State Machine Diagrams Wed 31/05/2023 TDD, Code Quality 10 23 Tue 06/06/2023 Continuous Integration & Deployment 8 - Testing Wed 07/06/2023 OO In Depth 1: Composition and Inheritance 11 24 Tue 13/06/2023 OO In Depth 2: Dynamic Typing, Duck Typing lab-09-testing-legacy Wed 14/06/2023 SOLID Principles, Refactoring to Patterns 12 25 Tue 20/06/2023 SOLID Principles, Refactoring to Patterns lab-10-legacy Wed 21/06/2023 Code Reading 13 26 Tue 27/06/2023 Application Architectures & System Models lab-11-code-reading Wed 28/06/2023 Patterns of Enterprise Application Architecture (POEAA) 14 27 Tue 04/07/2023 Web Applications lab-12-oo Wed 05/07/2023 Web Applications 15 28 Tue 11/07/2023 Internationalization and Localization lab-13-webapps-1 Wed 12/07/2023 TBD 16 29 Tue 18/07/2023 Exam Period Starts lab-14-webapps-2 Wed 19/07/2023 17 30 Tue 25/07/2023 Wed 26/07/2023 18 31 Tue 01/08/2023 Wed 02/08/2023
